reviewtext: What can I say?  The Palm Vx, for the money, is the best PDA you can buy.  It syncs FLAWLESSLY with my work Win2K laptop and my home desktop Mac.  Its reliable, the battery life is fantastic, and with 8MB of RAM, I find it MORE THAN ENOUGH for all my games, books and apps!My suggestion, skip the Palm 500 and save yourself $....the Palm Vx is everything the Palm 500 is and maybe even more!  Who needs the Secure expansion slot anyway?
